oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Interview with Jimmie Rodgers Snow by Uncle Dudley
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording features an interview between Jimmie Rodgers Snow and Uncle Dudley. The tape is dated February 9, 1955. The interview includes topics such as Snow's records and traveling, as well as listening to Snow's song. This tape is thirty of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jimmie Rodgers Snow; Uncle Dudley; Tom Diskin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Uncle Dudley begins the interview -- (0:11) Introduces Jimmie Rodgers Snow -- (01:00) Snow introduces Tom Diskin -- (01:18) Gentleman talks about Uncle Dudley's wife -- (02:01) Uncle Dudley asks Snow about his records -- (02:55) Uncle Dudley asks Snow where he is traveling next and with who -- (03:58) The three look at the line up for Little Rock show from Colonel Tom Parker, which includes Elvis -- (05:13) Uncle Dudley invites them back to go fishing -- (05:31) Uncle Dudley mentions another show with a similar line up -- (06:42) Uncle Dudley talks about Diskin's family -- (07:00) Uncle Dudley and Snow thank each other -- (07:15) Uncle Dudley introduces Snow's song, "Love Me" -- (07:37) Love Me (Jimmie Rodgers Snow)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Jimmie Rodgers;
